Package net.grinder.statistics

The Grinder statistics API.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ExpressionView Associate a statistic expression with display information.
StatisticsIndexMap A register of statistic index objects.
StatisticsIndexMap.DoubleIndex Opaque object that represents a double statistic.
StatisticsIndexMap.DoubleSampleIndex Object that represents a sample statistic with double sample values.
StatisticsIndexMap.LongIndex Opaque object that represents a long statistic.
StatisticsIndexMap.LongSampleIndex Object that represents a sample statistic with long sample values.
StatisticsView An ordered collection of ExpressionViews.
 

Exception Summary
StatisticsException Base type for exceptions raised by the statistics package.
 

Package net.grinder.statistics Description

The Grinder statistics API.

Statistics are attributes of the test results that appear in the console and the data logs. Scripts can use this API to:

  • report custom statistics;
  • register additional views of standard and custom statistics.

This API is for advanced scripts. Scripts that simply need to query or update the standard statistics (number of errors, test time and so on) can do so using the Statistics script API.

Example usage

Using a custom statistic from a script

# Obtain the index object for the a spare long statistic.
deliveryTimeIndex = StatisticsIndexMap.getInstance().getLongIndex("userLong0")

# Delay statistic reporting so we can alter statistics.
grinder.statistics.delayReports = 1

# Use the RawStatistics interface to set the statistic value for the
# last test.
grinder.statistics.setValue(deliveryTimeIndex, deliveryTime)

Registering custom statistic views from a script

detailView = StatisticsView()
detailView.add(ExpressionView("Delivery time", "", "userLong0"))

summaryView = StatisticsView()
summaryView.add(ExpressionView(
    "Mean delivery time",
    "statistic.deliveryTime",
    "(/ userLong0(+ (count timedTests) untimedTests))"))
	    
grinder.registerDetailStatisticsView(detailView)
grinder.registerSummaryStatisticsView(summaryView)
